info.title: Industry specific Cloudformation template generator agent API
info.description: Industry specific Cloudformation template generator agent API is a RESTful web service that is designed to get the use case, industry segment and return the Infrastructure as code, Readme and cost estimates.

get.summary: Gets the Infrastructure as code for security hub finding or title
get.description: Based on the customer input which includes the security hub finding id or title, the api should return the IAC to automate the remediation the finding

parameters.name: sechub_finding
parameters.description: The security finding title or Id

Infrastructure_Code.description: Return the infrastructure as code Cloudformation template to remediate the finding.
